mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, NVL(USER_PWD, '') AS USER_PWD, NVL(USER_NICK, '') AS USER_NICK, NVL(USER_NAME, '') AS USER_NAME, NVL(USER_PHONE, '') AS USER_PHONE, NVL(USER_ADDR, '') AS USER_ADDR, NVL(USER_EMAIL, '') AS USER_EMAIL, NVL(USER_CODE, 'U') AS USER_CODE, NVL(STATUS, 'N') AS STATUS, NVL(USER_FEE, 'N') AS USER_FEE, NVL(USER_CHARGE, 0) AS USER_CHARGE, NVL(USER_POSTCODE, '') AS USER_POSTCODE FROM A_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{value}

SELECT USER_ID, NVL(USER_PWD, '') AS USER_PWD, NVL(USER_NICK, '') AS USER_NICK, NVL(USER_NAME, '') AS USER_NAME, NVL(USER_PHONE, '') AS USER_PHONE, NVL(USER_ADDR, '') AS USER_ADDR, NVL(USER_EMAIL, '') AS USER_EMAIL, NVL(USER_CODE, 'U') AS USER_CODE, NVL(STATUS, 'N') AS STATUS, NVL(USER_FEE, 'N') AS USER_FEE, NVL(USER_CHARGE, 0) AS USER_CHARGE, NVL(USER_POSTCODE, '') AS USER_POSTCODE FROM A_USER WHERE USER_NICK = #{value}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO A_USER(USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NICK, USER_NAME, USER_PHONE, USER_POSTCODE, USER_ADDR, USER_EMAIL, USER_CODE, STATUS, USER_FEE, USER_CHARGE) VALUES(#{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userNick}, #{userName}, #{userPhone}, #{userPostcode}, #{userAddr}, #{userEmail}, 'U', 'Y', 'N', #{userCharge})
mapper.update: UPDATE A_USER SET USER_PWD = #{userPwd}, USER_NAME = #{userName}, USER_PHONE = #{userPhone}, USER_ADDR = #{userAddr}, USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail}, USER_POSTCODE = #{userPostcode} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
